name: lambda-typescript-template
description: AWS Lambda functions in TypeScript with AWS Powertools

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run build:functions
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:functions
scripts.package:functions: mkdir -p build && cd dist/health && zip -r ../../build/health.zip . && cd ../users && zip -r ../../build/users.zip . && cd ../posts && zip -r ../../build/posts.zip . && cd ../event-processor && zip -r ../../build/event-processor.zip .
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ dist/ && find src -name node_modules -type d -exec rm -rf {} +
